typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		c_customer_sk as integer,
		c_customer_id as string,
		c_current_cdemo_sk as integer,
		c_current_hdemo_sk as short,
		c_current_addr_sk as integer,
		c_first_shipto_date_sk as integer,
		c_first_sales_date_sk as integer,
		c_salutation as string,
		c_first_name as string,
		c_last_name as string,
		c_preferred_cust_flag as boolean,
		c_birth_day as short,
		c_birth_month as short,
		c_birth_year as short,
		c_birth_country as string,
		c_login as string,
		c_email_address as string,
		c_last_review_date as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(toInteger(c_birth_year)>1930) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(LAST_NAME = iif(locate("@",c_email_address) > 1,left(c_email_address, locate("@",c_email_address)-1),c_email_address)) ~> SplittingMovieGenres
SplittingMovieGenres window(over(PRIMARY_GENRE = LAST_NAME,
		YEAR_OF_RELEASE),
	desc(ROTTEN_TOMATO, true),
	RatingsRank = rank()) ~> RankMovies
RankMovies aggregate(groupBy(LAST_NAME,
		YEAR_OF_RELEASE),
	AverageRating = avg(toInteger(ROTTEN_TOMATO)),
		{Highest Rated} = first(MOVIE_NAME),
		LowestRated = last(MOVIE_NAME),
		NumberOfMovies = count()) ~> AggregateRatings
AggregateRatings sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		PrimaryGenre = LAST_NAME,
		YearOfRelease = YEAR_OF_RELEASE,
		AverageRating,
		HighestRated = {Highest Rated},
		LowestRated,
		NumberOfMovies
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
